alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 7:50AM CDT until March 24 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Inland Kenedy, Southern Hidalgo, Inland Willacy, Inland Cameron, Coastal Kenedy, Coastal Willacy and Coastal Cameron Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CDT today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is high probability of wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph over portions of Cameron and Willacy counties. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Power surges or power outages are possible. &&

area.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo
